name: Rain Hell
description:
Raise from the depths they banished you.
With your vengeful fury, rain Hell upon them.

Web build works best in Firefox and Chrome.

A short arcade shoot'em up for the Open Jam 2020

Controls:

  • Move - W, A, S, D  (Arrow Key also work if you are left-handed)
  • Aim - Move Mouse

Make sure to click over the angel you want to shoot!

Music by: Clue (@YouFoundAClue)
Their album can be downloaded here: https://youfoundaclue.bandcamp.com/album/rain-hell

Art and Code by: Capital-Ex (@Capital_EKS)
